title: Jordan's King Abdullah uses shell companies to buy lavish overseas homes, records show
content:
1. Jordan's King Abdullah uses shell companies to buy lavish overseas homes, records show  The Washington Post
  2. Pandora Papers: King of Jordan amassed £70m secret property empire  BBC News
  3. Jordan’s king receives first call from Syria’s al-Assad in decade  Al Jazeera English
  4. While foreign aid poured in, Jordan's King Abdullah funnelled $100m through secret companies to buy luxury homes - ICIJ  ICIJ.org
  5. Jordan's Abdullah receives first call from Syria's Assad since start of conflict  Reuters
